verbose_text: Protein tyrosine phosphatases (PTP) (especially PTP1B) [XREF_BIBR] may dephosphorylate tyrosine residues on IRS, and phosphatidylinositol phosphate (PIP) phosphatases may dephosphorylate PIPs at position 5 ' (SH2 containing PIP 5 '-phosphatase 2, or SHIP2) or 3 ' (phosphatase and tensin homolog, or PTEN) [XREF_BIBR], attenuating insulin signaling.
evidence: PTP) (especially PTP1B) [ XREF_BIBR ] may dephosphorylate tyrosine residues on IRS
